Sat, 03 Feb 2024 19:58:53 +0000 The Eyre River bridge, near Oxford in North Canterbury, earlier today after a Maui campervan driven by a tourist ploughed through the side of the one-lane bridge, leaving the front half of the vehicle hanging above the riverbed. Photo / Shelley Topp
